Beginner Kits.name: Looops Crochet Kit: American Pika
Beginner Kits.description:
Introducing Looops by Knit Picks™—a Pacific Northwest-inspired crochet kit intended for absolute beginners. Designed in collaboration with PNW artist HELLOhappy®, our kits bring iconic regional flora and fauna to life while making learning easy with step-by-step guidance. Not only does each kit include everything you need to create your project but also educational content about the featured item. Plus, with every purchase, you’re giving back—part of our proceeds supports organizations dedicated to conservation related to the Looops project featured in the kit. 

Craft your dreams, stitch by stitch—no skills needed!
Each American Pika Looops kit includes:

Pattern Booklet with Step by Step Video Tutorials, Pika Trading Card, Crochet Hook, Stitch Markers, Darning Needle, Keychain, Poly-fill, Safety Eyes
4 -25gm balls of Animation (100% mercerized cotton) 
Linen (body), Silver (ears), White or Swan (paws), Black (features)

Beginner Kits.name: Learn to Crochet Beanies Kit: Cake Pop
Beginner Kits.description:
Over a $20 value!
Perfect for beginners of all ages, this Learn to Crochet kit is a great place to start your crochet journey! As part of your kit, you'll receive a copy of Learn to Crochet from the WeCrochet Mini Hook Book series, which features info about crochet hooks and beginner-friendly yarns, photo tutorials of basic stitches, and 5 beginner-level patterns to get you started. One of those patterns is the Brava Beanie, a straightforward & quick-to-stitch project. The pattern is written for six sizes, ranging from baby to adult, so all head sizes are covered.
Packaged kit includes:

Mini Hook Book: Learn to Crochet
1 skein of Brava Speckle yarn in Cake Pop
WeCrochet Bright Crochet Hook - 5.5mm (I-9)
Cotton Project Bag - kit exclusive!

View All.description:
Introducing Looops by Knit Picks™—a Pacific Northwest-inspired crochet kit intended for absolute beginners. Designed in collaboration with PNW artist HELLOhappy®, our kits bring iconic regional flora and fauna to life while making learning easy with step-by-step guidance. Not only does each kit include everything you need to create your project but also educational content about the featured item. Plus, with every purchase, you’re giving back—part of our proceeds supports organizations dedicated to conservation related to the Looops project featured in the kit. 

Craft your dreams, stitch by stitch—no skills needed!
Each American Pika Looops kit includes:

Pattern Booklet with Step by Step Video Tutorials, Pika Trading Card, Crochet Hook, Stitch Markers, Darning Needle, Keychain, Poly-fill, Safety Eyes
4 -25gm balls of Animation (100% mercerized cotton) 
Linen (body), Silver (ears), White or Swan (paws), Black (features)

View All.name: Keziah Shawl CAL Bundle - Sample Colors
View All.description:
Have you thought of learning Tunisian crochet cables but weren't sure where to start? Does the terminology seem too confusing? How about converting knitting cables to Tunisian crochet? If any or all of these run through your mind and put you off this amazing technique, then hold on and don't throw the towel in just yet! Come on a four-week journey to explore Tunisian crochet cables by making the Keziah Shawl, designed by Miroslava of Exquisite Crochet UK.
During the CAL, you will learn and use basic techniques used in Tunisian crochet, basic and more advanced cable techniques including the popular Honeycomb cable, traveling cables, simple colorwork, how to increase and decrease, and various ways to bind off your work.
Please Note: Pattern is not included with yarn bundle. The pattern will be updated on a weekly basis and is available at the link below: Keziah Shawl CAL
Sample Colors bundle includes:

8 balls of Palette (3 each of Finnley Heather and Hare Heather plus 1 each of Forest Heather and Mulberry)
Total Yardage: 1,848

View All.name: Dishie-lous Tote Bundles
View All.description:
Over a $15 value!
*Included pattern is download only.
The Dishie-lous Market Tote is the perfect reusable and eco-friendly bag. Great for shopping, the beach, or as a project bag.
Includes a full video tutorial on the designer's YouTube channel. Bundle contains enough yarn to make the small-size bag. See more pattern details here: Dishie-lous Market Tote

View All.name: Island Time Blanket Yarn Bundle
View All.description:
Made with tried and true Wool of the Andes Worsted, this blanket is extra cozy. Its colorful palette is so cheerful it’s bound to remind you of tropical getaways and warmer, sunnier days ahead.
Bundle includes:

43 skeins of Wool of the Andes Worsted (14 of Cloud, 2 each of Blossom Heather and Paloma, 3 each of Dragonfruit, Caution, Crème Brulee, Green Tea Heather, Wonderland Heather, Marina, Solstice Heather, and Haze Heather, plus 1 of Papaya Heather)

Please Note: Pattern is not included with yarn bundle. Pattern is available for free from NautiKrall.

View All.name: Simple Two Stitch Blanket Bundles
View All.description:
Over a $41 value!
This fun blanket pattern is geared toward beginner crocheters looking to try larger designs. It’s a great introduction to working with color changes and uses only two basic stitches throughout. Because it’s a lap blanket, it’s not a huge project but still creates a cozy finished piece. If you’re an advanced crocheter, this blanket is a nice option for when you need a relaxing and simple project to work on. 
Finished project size:  39.5" x 44.5". See more pattern details here: Simple Two Stitch Blanket
*Included pattern is download only.

View All.name: Creating Clusters Dishcloth Bundle
View All.description:
Dishcloths are a great way to learn or practice new techniques, play with colorful yarn, or just whip up quick and easy projects. Bright and cheerful, these fun dishcloths will add a happy pop of color to every kitchen or bath. This set of patterns features simple cluster stitches made up of single and double crochet to create lovely textured fabrics, including the classic Catherine Wheel stitch pattern.

Includes:

3 balls of Dishie yarn (2 of Ash & 1 of Creme Brulee)
3 Printed Patterns (Jazz Age Dishcloth, Peach Margot Dishcloth*, and Custard Pie Dishcloth)

* The Peach Margot Dishcloth printed postcard pattern has an error in row 1.  The row should read: Row 1 (WS): SC into second ch from hook, SC into next ch, (sk 3 ch,  7 DC into next ch, sk 3 ch, SC into next 3 ch) This error affects the printed postcard in the kit only; the PDF available online is correct.

View All.name: Warm Lights Pillow Kit
View All.description:
Over a $60 value!
In our Magazine kits, you can make one of our favorite projects from the issue while getting everything you need to make the project. What could be better?! Just grab a pillow form and you can make this beautiful Warm Lights Pillow from Issue 5 today!

Issue 5 is a winter-inspired assortment of patterns. Our Warm Wishes collection has brightly colored projects to carry you through holiday celebrations, while Wintertide captures the feeling of cozy with neutral colors and aprés-ski cabin vibes.

WeCrochet Magazine: Issue 5
3 hanks of Wool of the Andes Superwash Bulky (2 of Dove Heather & 1 of Rouge)
WeCrochet Bright Crochet Hook 5.5mm  (I-9)
WeCrochet Zippered Pouch 
Large Zippered Project Bag

View All.name: Mosaic Gingerbread Blanket Yarn Bundle - Brava
View All.description:
Get ready to cozy up with the Mosaic Gingerbread Blanket Bundle—a festive overlay mosaic crochet pattern featuring charming gingerbread men, houses, and candy canes.
Bundles includes 29 skeins of Brava Worsted.
Please Note: Pattern is not included with yarn bundle. The pattern is available for purchase here Mosaic Gingerbread Blanket | Crochet.com or for free download from Juniper and Oakes

View All.name: Tons of Texture Dishcloth Bundle
View All.description:
Dishcloths are a great way to learn or practice new techniques, play with a colorful yarn, or just whip up quick and easy projects. Bright and cheerful, these fun dishcloths will add a happy pop of color to every kitchen or bath. Practice your single crochet, double crochet, cluster stitches, and bobbles with this pattern set. Perfect gift for a new crocheter.

Includes:

3 balls of Dishie yarn (1 each of Conch, Mint, and Aquarium Multi)
3 Printed Patterns (Little Leaves Dishcloth, Confused Textures Dishcloth, and Hipacious Houndstooth Dishcloth)

View All.name: Making Waves Dishcloth Bundle
View All.description:
Dishcloths are a great way to learn or practice new techniques, play with colorful yarn, or just whip up quick and easy projects. Bright and cheerful, these fun dishcloths will add a happy pop of color to every kitchen or bath, and working up this set of patterns will help you grow your skills! Practice your increases and decreases in both single and double crochet, create cluster stitches, and perfect your tapestry crochet to make a variety of different chevron dishcloths.
Includes:

3 balls of Dishie yarn (1 each of Kenai, Swan, and Herb Garden Multi)
3 Printed Patterns (Wavy Chevron Dishcloth, Chevron Dishcloth, and Multi Chevron Dishcloth)

View All.name: Autumn Sunflowers Blanket Yarn Bundle
View All.description:
Cuddle up with the rustic charm of this autumnal-themed blanket. Featuring sunflower motifs that are perfectly imperfect (the way nature intended), this simple-to-crochet blanket works up quickly in Wool of the Andes Tweed yarn. 
Bundle includes:

33 skeins of Wool of the Andes Tweed (8 each of Olive Heather and Oyster Heather, 4 of Rabbit Heather, 3 of Farmhouse Heather, plus 2 each of Prussian Heather, Cottage Heather, Sea Glass Heather, Vineyard Heather, and Forest Heather)     

Please Note: Pattern is not included with yarn bundle. Pattern is available for free from NautiKrall.

View All.name: Bobble Soap Sack Bundles
View All.description:
Designed to support the mission of the nonprofit organization S.A.C.K. (Supporting A Community with Kindness). This organization's vision is to inspire donations of bar soap to local food pantries, homeless shelters, social service agencies, and veterans clinics. By crocheting a soap sack and pairing it with a sealed bar of soap, you can give essential toiletries and a lovingly handmade item to those who need them. Find out more at soapsacks.com
This pattern is fun to crochet, and results in a soap sack with a scrubby side, thanks to the bobble stitches on the front. The bobbles provide a focal point, and a catalyst for creativity as you mix and match yarns to create unique soap sacks. You'll want to make these for gifts as well as donations to deserving organizations.
See more pattern details here: Bobble Soap Sack

View All.name: City Lights Shawl CAL Bundle - Option #3
View All.description:
Wrap yourself in comfort with the warm, yet lightweight, City Lights Shawl. Worked from one point to the opposite edge, this design is perfect for intermediate crocheters looking for a fun project with different colors and textures. The combination of a variety of interesting patterns with quick and airy stitches makes for a gorgeous finished result! The shorter depth and wide wingspan of the boomerang shape drape perfectly around your shoulders without the added bulk of traditional asymmetric shawl shapes. Throw it on as a cozy layering piece to give you a quick and stylish look with minimal effort!
Bundle includes 6 hanks of Gloss Fingering (2 each of Proper Pink and Captain plus 1 each of Clarity and Kenai)
Please Note: Pattern is not included with yarn bundle. Pattern is available for free here: City Lights Shawl CAL

View All.name: Nordic C2C Blanket Yarn Bundle - Serrano & White
View All.description:
Crochet your next holiday heirloom with the Nordic C2C Blanket! This project was created by Juniper & Oakes, with collaboration from 10 crochet designers.
Bundle includes: 

36 skeins of Swish Worsted (16 of Serrano and 20 of White)

Please Note: The pattern is not included in yarn bundle. The pattern is available for free from Juniper & Oakes.

View All.name: Oma Blanket Project Bundle
View All.description:
Over an $84 value!
*Included pattern is download only.
The Oma Blanket will satisfy even the most restless crocheter’s soul —from the choice of color to the choice of Granny Squares, there are endless possibilities. Work each square on the go, mixing and matching colors and patterns to create a unique heirloom crochet blanket to pass down through the generations. See more pattern details here: Oma Blanket
Finished Size: 40.5” Long x 54” Wide

View All.name: Ribbon Canyon Blanket Project Bundles
View All.description:
Over a $73 value!
*Included pattern is download only.
“Ribbon Canyon” is inspired by 1970s interior design and the undulating curve of a river, carving solid stone into sweeping canyons over the millennia. The whole design is built from a simple foundation. Once that’s completed, this project is a relaxing double crochet daydream. See more pattern details here: Ribbon Canyon Blanket

View All.name: Hue Shift Crochet Afghan Bundle
View All.description:
Over a $90 value!
The crochet version of the knit Hue Shift pattern, this afghan is crocheted in four pieces and seamed together. Each of the four pieces begins at one corner, and mitered squares are crocheted directly onto the existing work. Made with simple single crochet mitered squares and finished off with a darker border, the Hue Shift Afghan is a deceptively simple pattern that explores color in a new and creative way!

This kit features the same colors of Brava Sport yarn as the rainbow knit version (Black, Red, Rouge, Orange, Caution, Canary, Alfalfa, Tranquil, Celestial, Marina, and Fairy Tale). See more pattern details for this kit here: Hue Shift Crochet Afghan

View All.description:
Save up to $17 when you purchase a bundle!
This simple blanket uses only the humble double crochet stitch along with bold, contrasting stripes of color to deliver big results. The combination of this yarn and stitch pattern creates a very stretchy fabric. See more pattern details here: Beginner Blanket
Finished size: approximately 50" x 60"
Brava versions have over a $63 value; Brava Tweed bundles have over a $79 value.

View All.name: City Lights Shawl CAL Bundle - Option #2
View All.description:
Wrap yourself in comfort with the warm, yet lightweight, City Lights Shawl. Worked from one point to the opposite edge, this design is perfect for intermediate crocheters looking for a fun project with different colors and textures. The combination of a variety of interesting patterns with quick and airy stitches makes for a gorgeous finished result! The shorter depth and wide wingspan of the boomerang shape drape perfectly around your shoulders without the added bulk of traditional asymmetric shawl shapes. Throw it on as a cozy layering piece to give you a quick and stylish look with minimal effort!
Bundle includes 5 hanks of Gloss Fingering (2 of Smokey Quartz plus 1 each of Gypsum, Masala, and Bare [100g hank])
Please Note: Pattern is not included with yarn bundle. Pattern is available for free here: City Lights Shawl CAL
